thread.title: We want to know about your travels
thread.title_full: We want to know about your travels

title: We want to know about your travels
text:
We want to know about your travels Mon, 31 Aug 2015 3:43 PM Share Image supplied. 
Do you love to travel? 
Well, who doesn’t? What we really want to know is how you go about it… 
The Association of Southern African Travel Agents (ASATA) is asking South Africans bitten by the travel bug to reveal their deepest, darkest travel secrets. Just kidding, but ASATA would like to know more about your travels. 
Where do you travel to? 
How often? 
Do you book online or with a travel agent? 
And how are you inspired? 
Answer these and other questions in our holiday-makers’ survey and you could stand a chance to win a R1000 Woolies Voucher for your efforts. 
Help us discover where travel is going in the 21 st century by completing the survey now. Find it here . Related Articles
